medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse, sharp abdominal pain for the last 12 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began suddenly at 12pm on ___ and is rated ___ in severity. It is diffuse and worse in the lower quadrants of the abdomen. The patient also reports subjective fever and chills.
